zh_CN.DialogText: 所以我觉得我自己生存都很困难了

en_US.DialogText: So I think it's very difficult for me to survive

zh_CN.DialogText: 但是如果整个公社互相帮忙地话，难道不会更有效率一点吗？

en_US.DialogText: But wouldn't it be more efficient if we helped each other?

zh_CN.DialogText: 你也可以不必去地面上收集那些零件。

en_US.DialogText: You don't have to go to the ground to collect those parts.

zh_CN.DialogText: 你是说这个只有几十个人的公社？

en_US.DialogText: You mean this commune with only a few dozen people?

zh_CN.DialogText: 话说回来你又是怎么拿到这些小零件的？

en_US.DialogText: Anyway, how did you get these small parts?

zh_CN.DialogText: 当然是其他的幸存者拿来让我帮他们修修东西，他们估计也是从外面收集来的吧

en_US.DialogText: Of course, other survivors brought it to me to repair things for them. They probably collected it from outside

zh_CN.DialogText: 那还是让我自己来吧，毕竟我又不知道他们会收集来什么东西

en_US.DialogText: After all, I'll let them collect what I don't know

zh_CN.DialogText: 好吧，既然你坚持，但你还是随时可以来帮我忙，一样会给你这些零件的

en_US.DialogText: Well, since you insist, you can still come and help me at any time. I'll give you these parts as well

zh_CN.DialogText: 老工人拖沓着脚步离开了，低着头想着什么事情

en_US.DialogText: The old worker shuffled away, lowering his head and thinking about something
